news.title: 'No-one was expecting this': European leaders rush to US to help Ukraine avoid 'capitulation'
news.summary: The heads of state hope to stop Trump from threatening long-term European security, writes James Landale.

news.title: Man guilty over gangland shooting that left girl, 9, with bullet lodged in brain
news.summary: Javon Riley is found guilty over his role in the shooting of a girl at a restaurant in east London.

news.title: Hamas agrees to latest Gaza ceasefire proposal, source in group says
news.summary: The proposal from regional mediators would see Israeli hostages released in two batches during a 60-day truce, according to a Palestinian official.

news.title: Spain and Portugal fires kill two more as Spanish troops battle blazes
news.summary: Spain has sent 500 more troops to wildfire-affected regions, bringing the total deployed to 1,900.

news.title: BBC postpones Ozzy Osbourne documentary
news.summary: The film, showing the last years of Ozzy's life, had been scheduled to be broadcast on Monday.

news.title: Will UK feel the effect of Hurricane Erin?
news.summary: Will the remnants of Hurricane Erin have an impact on the UK's weather?  Shireen Jordan explains.

news.title: Love Island will not be investigated by Ofcom despite 14,000 complaints
news.summary: Bullying and concerns for contestants' mental health were among the main issues in the complaints.

news.title: BBC witnesses Israeli settlers' attack on Palestinian farm in West Bank
news.summary: A BBC team was interviewing a Palestinian farmer when masked men charged towards them.

news.title: Stadium ban for man bailed in Semenyo racism probe
news.summary: A 47-year-old man is banned from every UK football stadium after Antoine Semenyo reported being racially abused.

news.title: Soho House bought for Â£2bn as Ashton Kutcher joins board
news.summary: The private members' club chain is returning to private ownership after four years on the New York Stock Exchange.
